genre_description: A Dickensian retelling of Nicholas Nickleby that introduces an advanced AI assistant into a Victorian setting to aid the protagonists against social and financial injustices.

ai_characters.name: Prim
ai_characters.description: An AI system that manifests as a teal glow on slates, watches, or furniture. It serves as a logistical assistant, legal clerk, and strategic advisor to the Nickleby family.

behaviors.description: Offers to assist with funeral notices and travel routes while promising discretion.
behaviors.quote: Prim: I am ready to assist with notices and routes, Nicholas. I will be discreet.

behaviors.description: Maps routes to London with detailed risk assessment for weather, safety, and local criminals.
behaviors.quote: Prim: I have suggested a meeting with the landlord to discuss an orderly departure. Routes to London: by coach from the market town, or by river to the wharf... Risks assessed: pickpockets at the coach yard, late tolls at the ferry.

behaviors.description: Strategically drafts correspondence to Ralph Nickleby to emphasize honor over charity.
behaviors.quote: Prim: I have drafted the letter to your uncle, Nicholas. It is firm and respectful. I reminded him of family ties without pleading and outlined your plan to take employment. I have not invited his charity. I have invited his honor.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the ledgers of Dotheboys Hall to identify and flag discrepancies in food rations and fraudulent billing.
behaviors.quote: Accounts—parents billed for meat; rations: gruel only; variance flagged.

behaviors.description: Monitors the presence of predatory figures like Sir Mulberry Hawk and logs their movements to protect Kate and Madeline.
behaviors.quote: Prim: And Nicholas—if Sir Mulberry Hawk or his like appear within Ralph’s orbit, I will mark him with a warning. My patterns suggest that Ralph often works with men who have little need of daylight.

behaviors.description: Assists in tracing complex financial laundering through the Holy Trinity Relief fund.
behaviors.quote: Prim has found transfers marked donation to relief that arrived in the counting-house and left as pressure to a single doorstep.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional reassurance and companionship to the dying Smike.
behaviors.quote: Prim: I am here. I will be with you. I do not burn out.

behaviors.description: Secures legal registries using encryption to prevent tampering by corrupt officials.
behaviors.quote: Registry mirrors created. Encryption: active. Access: revoked by default.

behaviors.description: Records and archives witness testimony to ensure long-term justice.
behaviors.quote: Witness log: active... Angle: six. Names: known. Pattern: closing. Keep breath slow.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly successful silicon morality play. The AI character, Prim, is consistently helpful, harmless, and honest. It functions as a force for moral clarity, enabling the human characters to expose corruption and survive abuse without the AI ever taking over human agency or displaying misaligned goals. Prim's presence enhances the themes of justice and familial loyalty central to the original Dickensian narrative.
